Description: Granodiorite statue of Sekhmet, standing, with papyrus-staff before, base and arms missing or damaged.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2010/11 Oct-Mar, Leiden, National Museum Of Antiquities, Egyptian Magic 2011-13, Travelling Exhibition, Mummy: The Inside Story 19th Nov 2011- 11 Mar 2012. Richmond , VA, Virginia Museum of Fine Art. Mummy. The inside story. 2015-2016 27 May-10th Apr, Québec, Le Musée de la Civilisation, Egyptian Magic.
